
set(CMARK_GFM_VERSION_MAJOR 0)
set(CMARK_GFM_VERSION_MINOR 29)
set(CMARK_GFM_VERSION_PATCH 0)
set(CMARK_GFM_VERSION_GFM 13)
set(CMARK_GFM_VERSION ${CMARK_GFM_VERSION_MAJOR}.${CMARK_GFM_VERSION_MINOR}.${CMARK_GFM_VERSION_PATCH}.gfm.${CMARK_GFM_VERSION_GFM})

set(CMAKE_INCLUDE_CURRENT_DIR ON)

add_definitions(-DCMARK_GFM_STATIC_DEFINE)

add_subdirectory(src)
add_subdirectory(extensions)
